title: The Voice, Comeback
overview: In this competition parallel to the competition, Camille Lellouche will attend the performances from behind the scenes and will be able to offer a second chance to 6 talents during the blind auditions then to 2 other talents during the battles. She will coach and guide them in the adventure The Voice, Comeback. After several elimination phases where the selected candidates will perform in front of Camille Lellouche, she will designate a single talent who will have the chance to re-enter the "The Voice" competition directly in the final.
